page.title: 02WILDLIFE
page.content: Canna has a variety of wildlife including golden and sea eagles although these do not breed here. There are a great number of rabbits and these are a pest to the farm. Birds of prey ,such as the eagles and buzzards keep the population down but they still become a nuisance. Domestic cats and goats that have become feral roam around the island. The cats live on brown rats and rabbits. Canna is a bird sanctuary. Out of 157 species recorded 71 breed here. There are many different sea birds including:puffins,gulls,razor bills, guillemots,black guillemots, kittiwakes manx shearwaters, plovers and shags.Canna is one of the last breeding places of the corncrake.The Common and the Grey seal both breed on Canna and are often seen in the bay.
